long_description: Turn your Grayl Stainless-Steel Water Filtration Cup (sold separately) into a purifier that's suitable for international travel and outdoor use with this G3+ Replacement Purifier. G3+ purifier cartridge uses electroadsorption technology to eliminate 99.999% of bacteria, protozoa and viruses, including E. Coli, giardia, cryptosporidium and hepatitis A. Also reduces impurities that make tap water taste and smell bad, like chlorine, certain industrial and pharmaceutical chemicals and heavy metals. Grayl G3+ Replacement Purifier is rated for 300 uses, which equals 40 gal. of water; purifies 16 fl. oz. in about 30 sec.
